text: "Radio Free Europe" is a debut single from alternative rock band R.E.M.. It was released on 8 July 1981. ==Re-recording and I.R.S. single release== "Radio Free Europe" was re-released in 1983 and taken from their debut studio album Murmur. It went to number 78 in the United States. == References == Category:Rock songs Category:Indie rock songs Category:1981 songs Category:1983 songs Category:Debut singles Category:R.E.M. songs
title: Radio Free Europe (song)
